markdownRemark.html: The website you are using right now! This site was written by a volunteer during Summer 2020 using the Gatsby framework. The site lists software solutions written by OpportunityHack and their many volunteers!

frontmatter.title: OpportunityHack.io
frontmatter.mini_description: The website you are using right now! This site was written by a volunteer during Summer 2020 using the Gatsby framework. The site lists software solutions written by OpportunityHack and their many volunteers!
features: Central place for all software solutions.
Account dashboard accessible with only a Google account!
